review_text: The hit registration in this update feels off, shots aren't connecting.
Finally they nerfed the SMG meta, game feels balanced again.
Optimization is terrible, I'm barely getting 60fps on a 3080.
The new map design promotes way too much camping.
Anti-cheat is non-existent, ran into hackers in 3 straight lobbies.
Movement mechanics are crisp, best they've been in years.
Servers are lagging bad during peak hours. Unplayable.
Skill-based matchmaking is too aggressive, every game feels like a tournament.
Weapon recoil patterns are easy to learn but hard to master. Love it.
Audio cues are broken, can't hear footsteps behind me at all.
The battle pass progression is way too slow this season.
Great esports potential, but the ranked system needs a rework.
Teammates are toxic, we need a better endorsement system.
Input lag is noticeable on controller, needs a fix ASAP.
Visual clarity is poor, enemies blend into the background too much.
Best shooter on the market right now, hands down.
They removed the only good map from the rotation. Why?
ttk (time to kill) is way too fast, no time to react.
Sound design is punchy and satisfying.
The economy system in ranked matches makes no sense.
Performance is buttery smooth, getting 240Hz constant.
Hitboxes are broken on the new character models.
Please add a solo queue for ranked, I'm tired of stacks.
The grind for weapon attachments is ridiculous.
Devs are actually listening to feedback for once.
Disconnect issues are ruining my rank.
Spawn logic is broken, I spawned right in front of an enemy.
Crossplay aim assist is way too strong, keyboard players have no chance.
Love the high skill ceiling in this game.
Netcode is spaghetti, dying around corners constantly.
Inventory management is clunky and slow during fights.
The new operator is completely pay-to-win.
Spectator mode is buggy, crashes half the time.
Solid gunplay, but the content drought is real.
UI is cluttered and confusing to navigate.
The ping system is a game changer for solo play.
Loot distribution is totally RNG, needs balancing.
Frame drops when smokes are deployed are unacceptable.
Ranking up feels rewarding, finally a good Elo system.
Too many microtransactions, feels like a mobile game.
The dedicated servers are huge upgrade from peer-to-peer.
Flashbang effect lasts way too long.
Sniper glint is too visible, gives away position instantly.
Map rotation is stale, we need community maps.
Tick rate on the servers needs to be higher.
The tutorial doesn't teach you anything about the actual meta.
Great game for aim training, very fast paced.
Voice chat quality is surprisingly good.
Wait times for ranked matches are getting out of hand.
Overall a solid competitive experience, just fix the bugs.
